page.title: 09Shops
page.content: All the surveyed shops are in Llanrwst. A busy market town it caters for most needs. The food shops are varied and often sell local produce in season, with home killed meat in the butchers. There are two home bakeries, a fish and chip shop and sandwich take-away outlets. DIY materials such as paint, wall-paper, wood, plumbing items, builders materials etc., household goods such as floor coverings, soft furnishings,furniture and lighting needs, hardware and crockery are all available. Farm machinery for sale or hire and a Calor Gas bottle service provide an essential service. There are shops which cater for shoes and clothes for all ages. Repair services for watches, TV and jewellery are all here, and there is a dispensing chemist and a photo-copying and printing service.
